{Herr} {Williamson}

We would like to remind you that we require the following information as an attachment to your leasing contract:
  • A copy of your foreigner's identity card if you are not a Swiss citizen.
  • A proof of salary (not older than three months)

Please send us the documents digitally (PDF file) by replying directly to this email.

As a Swiss leasing provider, the security of your data is very important to us. We limit ourselves to collecting the legally required information and process it securely.

If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.

With kind regards,

Your LeaseTeq Team ♥
